summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through a toll booth and then onto a wide road. The white sedan ahead is moving from the left lane to the right lane, eventually cutting in front of the observer vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while approaching the toll booth and then accelerating slightly as it moves onto the wide road. The vehicle ahead is changing lanes from left to right, causing the observer vehicle to adjust its speed and direction to avoid collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving from the left lane to the right lane, cutting in front of the observer vehicle.
